constructors.name: new
constructors.args_string: (particles = seed_particle, grower = DLA::Grower(V).new)

def.name: new_particle
def.body: Context(V).new(particles: particles, particle_radius: @particle_radius, spawn_radius: spawn_radius, kill_radius: kill_radius, overlap: @overlap).new_particle

constructors.name: new
constructors.args_string: (particles, particle_radius = 1.0, spawn_radius = 10.0, kill_radius = 20.0, overlap = 0.2)

def.name: new
def.body:
_ = Context(V).allocate
_.initialize(particles, particle_radius, spawn_radius, kill_radius, overlap)
if _.responds_to?(:finalize)
  ::GC.add_finalizer(_)
end
_

constructors.name: new
constructors.args_string: (particles = ([] of Geo::Particle(V)))

constructors.name: new
constructors.args_string: (aggregate : DLA::Aggregate(Geo::Vector2), scale = 10, padding = 0.2, filename = "./data/test.svg")

def.name: new
def.body:
_ = allocate
_.initialize(aggregate, scale, padding, filename)
if _.responds_to?(:finalize)
  ::GC.add_finalizer(_)
end
_

def.name: components
def.body:
vertices = build_vertices(@values)
inner_edges = build_edges(vertices)
outer_edges = build_edges(vertices.reverse)
link_cycle(inner_edges)
link_cycle(outer_edges)
link_twins(inner_edges, outer_edges)
edges = inner_edges + outer_edges
{values: @values, vertices: vertices, edges: edges}

def.name: aabb
def.body: Geo::AABB(V).new(minimum_point: center - radius, maximum_point: center + radius)

zip_map(rhs) do |c0, c1|
  c0 + c1
end

zip_map(rhs) do |c0, c1|
  c0 - c1
end

test(rhs) do |c0, c1|
  c0 < c1
end

test(rhs) do |c0, c1|
  c0 <= c1
end

test(rhs) do |c0, c1|
  c0 == c1
end

test(rhs) do |c0, c1|
  c0 > c1
end

test(rhs) do |c0, c1|
  c0 >= c1
end

def.name: max
def.body:
zip_map(rhs) do |c0, c1|
  Math.max(c0, c1)
end

def.name: min
def.body:
zip_map(rhs) do |c0, c1|
  Math.min(c0, c1)
end

def.name: infinite
def.body: new({Float64::INFINITY * sign, Float64::INFINITY * sign, Float64::INFINITY * sign})

def.name: random
def.body:
theta = (2 * Math::PI) * Random.rand
phi = Math.acos((2 * Random.rand) - 1)
from_spherical_coordinates(theta, phi, radius)
